Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.hibernate.search.engine.spi.EntityIndexBinder
    Since 4.4. Use EntityIndexBinding instead
    org.hibernate.search.store.IndexShardingStrategy
    Deprecated as of Hibernate Search 4.4. Might be removed in Search 5. Use ShardIdentifierProvider instead.
    org.hibernate.search.store.LockFactoryFactory
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.hibernate.search.util.impl.ContextHelper
    Use FullTextSession.getSearchFactory() instead.
    org.hibernate.search.engine.impl.EmptyBuildContext
    org.hibernate.search.impl.EntityIndexBindingWrapper
    Will be removed when EntityIndexBinder gets removed
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.Similarity
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.hibernate.search.infinispan.impl.InfinispanDirectoryProvider.DEFAULT_INDEXESDATA_CACHENAME
    org.hibernate.search.infinispan.impl.InfinispanDirectoryProvider.DEFAULT_INDEXESMETADATA_CACHENAME
    org.hibernate.search.infinispan.impl.InfinispanDirectoryProvider.DEFAULT_LOCKING_CACHENAME
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.hibernate.search.FullTextSharedSessionBuilder.autoClose()
    org.hibernate.search.FullTextSharedSessionBuilder.autoClose(boolean)
    org.hibernate.search.engine.spi.SearchFactoryImplementor.getAllIndexesManager()
    As of Search 4.4, replaced by SearchFactoryImplementor.getIndexManagerHolder()
    org.hibernate.search.spi.internals.SearchFactoryState.getIndexBindingForEntity()
    since 4.4. Use SearchFactoryState.getIndexBindings()
    org.hibernate.search.engine.spi.SearchFactoryImplementor.getIndexBindingForEntity()
    since 4.4. Use SearchFactoryImplementor.getIndexBindings()
    org.hibernate.search.spi.SearchFactoryIntegrator.getIndexBindingForEntity(Class)
    since 4.4. Use SearchFactoryIntegrator.getIndexBinding(Class)
    org.hibernate.search.query.engine.spi.HSQuery.getSearchFactoryImplementor()
    should be at most SearchFactoryIntegrator, preferably removed altogether
    org.hibernate.search.util.impl.ClassLoaderHelper.instanceFromName(Class, String, Class, String)
    Use ClassLoaderHelper.instanceFromName(Class, String, ClassLoader, String) instead
    org.hibernate.search.engine.spi.AbstractDocumentBuilder.isCollectionRoleExcluded(String)
    Use AbstractDocumentBuilder.collectionChangeRequiresIndexUpdate(String) instead
    org.hibernate.search.spi.BuildContext.releaseService(Class>)
    use BuildContext.getServiceManager() instead
    org.hibernate.search.engine.impl.EmptyBuildContext.releaseService(Class>)
    org.hibernate.search.spi.BuildContext.requestService(Class>)
    use BuildContext.getServiceManager() instead
    org.hibernate.search.engine.impl.EmptyBuildContext.requestService(Class>)
    org.hibernate.search.impl.MassIndexerImpl.threadsForIndexWriter(int)
    org.hibernate.search.MassIndexer.threadsForIndexWriter(int)
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    org.hibernate.search.query.facet.FacetSortOrder.RANGE_DEFINITION_ODER
    use FacetSortOrder.RANGE_DEFINITION_ORDER
